title: Is my pixel 4a battery defective?
content:
Is my pixel 4a battery defective? I have it for a week. It said full charge last 13 hours. Other pixel 4a owner I see show 20 hours and more. Screen on Time or Screen usage since full charge is 5 hour to 5 hour 20 minutes.

I just installed AccuBattery and in Discharging tab and the bottom said "Full Battery Time Estimates" show 5 hour screen on, 24 hour screen off, and 18 hour combine use.
